divs: Sighting DetailsSaw the orange lights I saw last time here on Jan 30th 2009. Except this time it appeared in a row and in a diaganle (spelling) line ...it was orange and red ..first time it came on as 1 orange light then a row of 5. Then 5 minutes later it blinked on as 1 light then 2 then 3 then 4 then 5 this time it was spaced out ..reminded of the lights in Phoenix. They didn't stay on for more than a 2-3 seconds each time.
Summary: Same lights from the last time.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around March 5th 2009
